title: 5 best beach huts in the world from £24 a night, as Essex coast home ‘Betty’ is named best in Britain - Mirror
text:
A shabby-chic inspired Essex beach hut called 'Betty' has been named the best in Britain for it's charity-roots and retro interiors.
Location Location Location presenter Phil Spencer awarded Jane Ashmore's 'Betty' hut in Essex, the Towergate Beach Hut of the Year for its retro-chic aesthetic and the charitable role it plays within the local community.
As one of 11 finalists, Betty was chosen after a week-long public vote for her creativity and quirky decor with items handpicked from charity boutiques.
Location Location Location's Phil Spencer with Betty's owner Jane Ashmore
Once used as holiday family home, Jane now lets the hut out to a number of community charities for free and regularly gives vouchers to Great Ormond Street Hospital to be auctioned - usually raising £350 or more.
"'Betty' was chosen for its beautiful decor and its admirable contribution to the local community which made it a stand out hut for us," Phil Spencer explained.
5 best beach huts deals, from Cornwall to Bali Home-from-home beach huts are perfect for Brits after a mini escape and can offer an affordable holiday alternative, from £24 a night.
Whether it’s a two-bed in Cornwall perfect for the kids to play in, a tree covered fortress in Sao Paulo or an isolated, gazebo style hut in Bali, here are 5 of the best, courtesy of Holiday Lettings .
